attributes.action: Acknoledge the Disclosure Project and to fully disclose advanced energy technology to help remove the need for our dependance on Oil.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Disclosure Project is a non for profit research project, working to fully disclose the facts about UFOs, extraterrestrial intelligence, and classified advanced energy and propulsion systems.  This information has been hidden by government organisations because of the special interests of the major oil companies which are currently making £Billions per year.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
